description:
io: prevent write to PipeWriter after Close

Return an ErrClosedPipe rather than allowing the write to proceed.

Fixes issue 5330.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d1915bedce06 ***

io: prevent write to PipeWriter after Close

Return an ErrClosedPipe rather than allowing the write to proceed.

Fixes issue 5330.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12541053

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 12541053: io: prevent write to PipeWriter after Close
